channel.title: Blog Posts on Rebecca Janis
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts on Rebecca Janis

item.title: Apple Music Year In Review
item.description: With 2018 coming to a close and many of my friends posting their Spotify year in review showing their most listened to songs, I was feeling jealous as an Apple Music user that I couldn’t see my music year in review. So, in what could prove to be an embarassing foray into my very basic taste in music, I decided to make my own Apple Music year in review! If you want to download your own Apple Music data, head to Apple’s Data and Privacy page, and select “Request a copy of your data.

item.title: Batch Producing Rmarkdown documents
item.description: Dyamically updating YAML Rendering Issue I ran into an issue where the loop would render reports for a single school or even a couple schools just fine, but when I tried to run the loop on all 28 schools, Rstudio would inexplicably hang and eventually abort after about 5 reports. I found a solution on stack overflow to add knitr::knit_meta(class=NULL, clean = TRUE) to the beginning of the for loop, which allowed all the reports to render successfully.
